inclusion.criterion: Subject presents with aortic stenosis or stenosis-based insufficiency of an aortic valve requiring a planned replacement of the native aortic valve or previously implanted aortic prosthesis.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject has signed and dated the investigation informed consent forms prior to study-specific procedures are performed.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Subject is geographically stable and agrees to attend follow-up assessments as specified in the protocol and informed consent.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of active endocarditis within three months of scheduled surgery
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subject is diagnosed with pure aortic insufficiency
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Aneurysm of the aortic root and/or ascending aorta
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has severe aortic stenosis with worsening LV function, EF was 25%. He underwent cardiac cath with right heart cath to evaluate his pulm art pressures which showed no angiographically apparent flow-limiting coronary artery disease.
